Episodes.Title: Cranky Bugs
Episodes.Plot: Cranky the crane is working at the docks.

Episodes.Title: Horrid Lorry
Episodes.Plot: One morning, Percy is late with his train to the docks. Cranky begins to criticise Percy, but Percy complains there is too much work. Cranky suggests it would be better if lorries did his work. Percy is shocked by this. Later at the sheds, Percy tells the other engines what Cranky had said.

Episodes.Title: A Better View for Gordon
Episodes.Plot: Gordon's boasting comes to a sudden halt at the opening of a new station.

Episodes.Title: Lady Hatt's Birthday Party
Episodes.Plot: One Summer's Day, Bertie asks Thomas and Percy if they've noticed something different about The Fat Controller. Percy tells Bertie that he saw The Fat Controller staring into the clouds this morning, and he wonders why. It was Lady Hatt's birthday and the Fat Controller had a new outfit to wear espe

Episodes.Title: James and the Trouble with Trees
Episodes.Plot: Thomas had been working at the coaling plant all day. He is disappointed when he cannot receive a wash-down due to a broken hosepipe and is afraid that the other engines will make fun of him. However, when Thomas returns to the shed, he finds James boasting.

Episodes.Title: Gordon and the Gremlin
Episodes.Plot: Gordon has problems with his fire, and the firelighter suggests it is due to gremlins. Thomas and Percy get excited, but James thinks it is nonsense. The engines argue about the issue until the Fat Controller arrives and informs the engines that a VIP is coming, who has heard a lot about the Fat Con

Episodes.Title: Bye George!
Episodes.Plot: George the Steamroller is very rude to the engines.

Episodes.Title: Baa!
Episodes.Plot: Percy is excited about the best dressed station competition on the island; a stray ram saves Maithwaite station's chances of winning and gets a tasty treat as a reward.

Episodes.Title: Put Upon Percy
Episodes.Plot: Percy is asked to push some trucks into a mine but he pushes the trucks too hard and they run down into the depths of the mine and crash into a support beam.

Episodes.Title: Toby and the Flood
Episodes.Plot: During many days of rain, Toby is asked to investigate a dam during rainy weather, and discovers it is about to burst its banks. Toby hurries to get to higher ground, but the bridge he is on is swept away after the dam collapses.

Episodes.Title: Haunted Henry
Episodes.Plot: One evening, Henry is working late with Edward, and an owl hoots. Edward warns Henry that when the owl hoots, a mist will roll in soon, along with a ghost. Henry scoffs at the story and sets off with his goods train, but later to his surprise, a mist does roll in. He has to slow at an amber signal,

Episodes.Title: Stepney Gets Lost
Episodes.Plot: Stepney heads home, but takes a wrong turn after fog descends and ends up in the scrapyards.
